title: Riot merch missing?
body: So I purchased a Tibbers onsie from RIOT a little over a week ago now, and my bank account was charged. I got an email saying that my order had just been shipped and included a order tracking number, however the number turns up nothing when searched and still nothing has arrived. I am confused as to what could have happened because it looks like the package never got shipped as the tracking number is a fake. What should I do?

replies.body: Hey, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our merch team can look into this for you and reach out directly.  Otherwise, it can also take a little bit of time for tracking to update on shipping sites, so there's a good chance your tracker should be up to date now.  Otherwise, we'll take a look and see what happened!
I was going to put that support ticket in, but looks like everything was fine. Hoodie arrived about two days later. Sorry for the trouble!
Same problem. Ordered the new Yasuo hoodie. Help?
